dc_description_s: Through the Supermarket Tax Exemption Act of 2000 The incentive encourages investment in areas lacking access to groceries and fresh food. This map displays the eligible areas for supermarkets to locate and be eligible for the tax incentives. For more information:https://beta.code.dccouncil.us/dc/council/code/titles/47/chapters/38/.Supermarket Tax Incentive locations. The dataset contains locations and attributes of Supermarket Tax Exemption locationsC. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies. A dataset provided by the Office of the Deputy Mayor for Planning and Economic Development and the Office of Planning All DC GIS data is stored and exported in Maryland State Plane coordinates NAD 83 meters.
